shortDescription: Architectural leaves that filter indoor air and thrive beside the bed.
description: A hardy, drought-tolerant purifier that handles low light, missed waterings, and dry apartments with ease.

shortDescription: Statement tree with violin-shaped leaves for bright living room corners.
description: Loves bright, filtered light and consistent moisture. Rotate weekly for even growth and dust leaves for a glossy finish.

shortDescription: Fast-growing vines that cascade from shelves and window ledges.
description: Beginner-proof, tolerant of varied light, and happy with weekly watering. Trail it high or train it to climb a moss pole.

shortDescription: Glossy, drought-tolerant foliage that stays lush with minimal sunlight.
description: Handles offices and shaded corners with ease. Water lightly every 2-3 weeks and enjoy a consistent, sculptural silhouette.

shortDescription: Elegant white blooms and glossy leaves that brighten living rooms.
description: Keep soil lightly moist and mist weekly. Rewarded with blooms and cleaner air in bright, indirect light.

shortDescription: Iconic split leaves that love bright corners and weekly misting.
description: Thrives in bright, indirect light with moderate humidity. Train on a moss pole for dramatic fenestrations.

shortDescription: Glossy, upright foliage that anchors modern living rooms.
description: Prefers bright, filtered light and deep watering every 10-14 days. Wipe leaves monthly to keep them shining.

shortDescription: Silver-striped leaves that love humidity and soft, dappled light.
description: Keep soil evenly moist with filtered water, avoid direct sun, and pair with a humidifier for crisp striping.

shortDescription: Sun-loving, drought-proof succulent with soothing gel-filled leaves.
description: Park in a bright window, water deeply but rarely, and ensure gritty, fast-draining soil for a happy rosette.

shortDescription: Colorful, tolerant foliage that brightens low-light corners.
description: Handles low to medium light, appreciates moderate watering, and adds patterned leaves without demanding upkeep.
